name: Abdul-Basir Jalali
personality: Azim is a quiet and reserved individual. He is highly disciplined and takes great pride in his work. When he is not training, he spends his time reading and learning more about his faith.
story: Azim was born in the Islamic Republic of Iran. He grew up in a devout Muslim family and was taught the importance of discipline and hard work from a young age. Azim showed a great interest in the military and decided to join the Iranian Army as soon as he was eligible. After completing his training, Azim was chosen to join the elite special forces unit. He was quickly recognized for his marksmanship and was soon selected to attend the international training program in Takistan. Azim takes great pride in serving his country and his faith.
